lead_paragraph: Candy Crowley is replacing John King on “State of the Union,” and he is taking over the time slot once held by Lou Dobbs.
snippet: Candy Crowley is replacing John King on “State of the Union,” and he is taking over the time slot once held by Lou Dobbs.

headline.main: Crowley to Anchor Sunday Talk Show on CNN
headline.seo: Candy Crowley to Anchor ‘State of the Union’ on CNN
headline.print_headline: Crowley to Anchor Sunday Talk Show on CNN
